data.Sentence: --- Lesson 20  One man in a boat

data.Sentence_cn: 钓鱼是我特别喜爱的一项运动。
我经常一钓数小时却一无所获，
data.Sentence: I often fish for hours without catching anything.
But this does not worry me.

data.Sentence_cn: 有些垂钓者就是不走运，
他们往往鱼钓不到，却钓上来些旧靴子和垃圾。
data.Sentence: Instead of catching fish, they catch old boots and rubbish.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的运气甚至还不及他们。
我什么东西也未钓到过 -- 就连旧靴子也没有。
data.Sentence: I never catch anything -- not even old boots.

data.Sentence_cn: 我总是在河上呆上整整一上午，然后空着袋子回家。
data.Sentence: After having spent whole mornings on the river, I always go home with an empty bag.

data.Sentence_cn: “你可别再钓鱼了！”我的朋友们说，“这是浪费时间。”
data.Sentence: 'You must give up fishing!' my friends say. 'It's a waste of time.'

data.Sentence_cn: 然而他们没有认识到重要的一点，
data.Sentence: But they don't realize one important thing.

data.Sentence_cn: 我并不是真的对钓鱼有兴趣，
data.Sentence: I'm not really interested in fishing.

data.Sentence_cn: 我感兴趣的只是独坐孤舟，无所事事！
data.Sentence: I am only interested in sitting in a boat and doing nothing at all!
